ygData.subject: Sol A
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually Sol A (Solusek Eye) you can start out in the low 20s.  I v found stuff that still gives me exp at level 35 in Sol A, but it sure isn t much ...
ygData.messageBody:
Actually Sol A (Solusek Eye) you can start out in the low 20s. I'v found
stuff that still gives me exp at level 35 in Sol A, but it sure isn't much
>when it happens. If your going to solo there, best be level, oh say, 50.
>I don;t believe there to be a way to safely solo in Sol and still get exp
>at any level. Most of the place was green to me even at 33 (when I first
>went there).

Eeeeesh! :( Thanks for the tips...I guess I'll avoid the area for a bit.
Yeah, I usually don't like going solo either...but there are sometimes those
nights when nobody wants to group and I go off on exploration journeys. :)
Perma is another place I wanted to venture...but it sounds like the goblins
there are no fun too. ;)

-- Lim'Dul
